commit.message:
Multigroup structure with configuration CRDs everywhere, move to UBI images (#148)

* Enable kubebuilder multigroup structure, move api -> apis/cassandra, controllers -> controllers/cassandra

* Remove unused tools directory

* Use ubi8-micro base for operator and system-logger

* Fix paths

* Remove deprecated Reaper configs

* Make images configurable, use config files instead of parameters for containers

* Fix unit tests

* Fix .gitignore

* Configure ImagePullPolicy from the configuration

* Move imageConfig to operConfig, add test for imageConfig parsing, rename skipValidatingWebhooks to disableWebhooks, disable auth proxy and fix main.go parsing order

* ..

* Fix canary upgrade test
